cu.explanation_en: Setting the ASN.1 verbosity to an unknown enum 'invalid_verbosity' will cause parsing errors in ASN.1 messages, leading to communication failures between CU and DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RF simulator server port to a negative value -1 will cause socket binding failures, preventing proper RF simulation and leading to initialization errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RF 模擬器伺服器端口設定為負值 -1 會導致 socket 綁定失敗，無法進行適當的 RF 模擬，並導致初始化錯誤。
